RECOMMENDATIONS.TIP: Pick five or more of your favorite artists
RECOMMENDATIONS.SUCCESS: Recommendation preferences have been updated successfully

VKMIX.TITLE: Listen to VK Mix
VKMIX.DESCRIPTION: A playlist suited to your tastes

FILTER.TIP: Tip: Press Enter to search audio

DOWNLOAD.SUCCESS: Playlist "{{ title }}" has been downloaded successfully

BETA.TITLE: Get Beta updates
BETA.TIP: Test builds may be unstable, but you get the opportunity to test new features before others. Requires application restart

STREAMER.TITLE: Streamer mode
STREAMER.TIP: Writes information about the current track to files located in the specified folder for display via OBS and other applications for live broadcasts

WINDOW_CONTROL_BUTTONS.TITLE: Hide window control buttons
WINDOW_CONTROL_BUTTONS.TIP: It will be useful if you use a tiling window manager

FULL_FRAME.TITLE: Use the entire application window space
FULL_FRAME.TIP: Using the entire space disables the transparent window, which will make outer shadows at the window borders and rounding at the edges inaccessible, but guarantees full functionality of the native window. Requires application restart

ACRYLIC.TITLE: Enable Windows 11 acrylic effect (unstable)
ACRYLIC.TIP: Not recommended. You need to enable acrylic effects in Windows settings. Requires application restart

ZOOM.TITLE: Scaling the interface
TIP: Use keyboard shortcuts to change the scale of the interface:

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Download theme from repository
DOWNLOAD.TIP: Fill in all the fields. Only data from GitHub is accepted

RESET.THEME_SUCCESS: Theme "{{ theme }}" has been successfully resetted

THEME.AUTHOR: Author: {{ author }}
THEME.OUTDATED:
Theme version is incompatible with the app version.
Contact the author of the theme
THEME.OUTDATED_CONFIRMATION: Theme version is incompatible with the app version. Continue?

VOLUME_DIVIDER.TITLE: Volume divider
VOLUME_DIVIDER.TIP: If it seems to you that the volume of the tracks does not correspond to the specified percentage of the volume in the player, then change the volume divider

MINIMODE.TITLE: Mini mode
MINIMODE.TIP: Disables mini window controls and styles keeping only current track information

REWIND.TITLE: Rewind to the start
REWIND.TIP: By enabling this option, when you press the "previous track" button, the player will start playing the track again instead of playing the previous track if the listening progress has reached {{ rewind }} seconds or more

NORMALIZER.TITLE: Audio volume normalizer
NORMALIZER.TIP: Averages the volume level of the music. Do not enable this option if you are listening to music at a medium or high volume level (from 20% and above)

MAX.TITLE: Maximum volume increase (dB)
MAX.TIP: The volume of music is a subjective concept. Choose for yourself the maximum percentage of music volume increase

STASH_SIZE.TITLE: The number of fetched audios in the playlist
STASH_SIZE.TIP: To optimize work with system resources, Meridius uses its own music storage system when downloading. This setting determines how many audios will be displayed when redirecting to the playlist. You can set number in the range from 20 to 100

LOADING_RESTRICTION.TITLE: Restriction on loading audios
LOADING_RESTRICTION.TIP: Here you can set the desired maximum number of tracks that will be loaded when playing playlists. By default, the number of downloaded tracks is 1000, the minimum is 100, the maximum is 10000. It is not recommended to set a value higher than 2000, this cause long downloads, freezes, crashes and high consumption of system resources with a large amount of audio

AUTO.TITLE: Automatically detect the number of simultaneous downloads
AUTO.TIP: Recommended for use. The number of downloads is determined depending on the performance of your processor in order to avoid application or system freezes

FIXED.TITLE: Fixed number of simultaneous downloads
FIXED.TIP: You can set a fixed value for simultaneous downloads. The value cannot be greater than 10. Increase the value at your own risk if you have a low performance CPU

FFMPEG.TITLE: Audio converting
FFMPEG.TIP: FFmpeg - it's free open-source tool to processing media files. Requires for combining streaming files into one
FFMPEG.LINUX: Install FFmpeg using the command listed below and restart the application. If no command is suitable for your system or FFmpeg cannot be installed correctly on your system, then look for a solution on the Internet. It is recommended to reinstall the application from the FlatHub with built-in FFmpeg

TEMPLATE.TITLE: File name template
TEMPLATE.TIP: Set a template for the file name when downloading using headers

PASSWORD.TIP: Your password is encrypted once and is not stored anywhere, so it should be written down. The server verifies the authenticity of the password upon request. Open the manual for more detailed information about server and connection

CONFIRMATION.DELETE_PLAYLIST: Do you want to delete playlist "{{ title }}"?
CONFIRMATION.DELETE_THEME: Do you want to delete this theme?
CONFIRMATION.GITHUB_CONNECTION: No connection to GitHub, Meridius will continue to work, but with errors and without support. Use at your own risk

PC.CHOOSE: Click to select files to upload

YOUTUBE.NOFFMPEG: You need to have FFmpeg installed to use this feature

DESCRIPTION.CORRUPTED: Meridius detected a problem when refreshing the session. Cookie may be corrupted. Take steps to avoid critical errors.
DESCRIPTION.REASONS_TITLE: Reasons why cookie file may be corrupted:

REASONS.TITLE: Invalid session
REASONS.DESCRIPTION: Sessions become inactive on all devices when you change your password or deauthorize all devices on your account. You need to reauthorize your account.

REASONS.TITLE: Error connecting to VK when trying to automatically refresh the session
REASONS.DESCRIPTION: Meridius refresh the session every few minutes and during this period the connection may be lost. In this case, you just need to wait until the connection is restored and relaunch Meridius.

REASONS.TITLE: Cryptography Error (MachineGuid)
REASONS.DESCRIPTION: Your Windows has been modified and the cryptography service is disabled. This is an important service for protecting your account, so its presence is strictly required for the application to work. Restore the service or reinstall the system.

LOGIN.QR_DESCRIPTION: Scan the QR code in the VKontakte app

ERRORS.CYRILLIC: Cyrillic is not allowed in the password
ERRORS.EMPTY_FIELD: You must enter your username and password
ERRORS.TFA_REQUIRED: You must to enter two-factor code
ERRORS.CAPTCHA_REQUIRED: You must to solve the captcha

EULA.TITLE: the user agreement
EULA.TEXT:
Before using Meridius, read the user agreement.

Meridius is proprietary software that does not pursue commercial purposes and is distributed free of charge. Meridius is an unofficial desktop music player for the VKontakte website, the application and its developer have nothing to do with the administration and other employees of VK.

Sending and storage data
Your credentials are not sent anywhere, only stored on your device in encrypted form.

Disclaimer
Developer are not responsible for the loss of your personal data in case of leaks or hacking.

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.LABEL: Let's see the answer for you're questions.

FAQ.question: Why?
FAQ.answer: The first reason - consuming of PC resources. Meridius consumes PC resources less than any desktop browser.

FAQ.question: Why VK if Spotify / Apple Music more easy and has more music?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it has, many other services has more information about songs, artists and playlists, but from personal experience I could say that this services has no so much music cause VK users can upload any music in any time.

FAQ.question: I found a bug / I have an offer to improve Meridius
FAQ.answer: You can report this on our Discord server.

FAQ.question: How to download music?
FAQ.answer: Open download settings, then install FFmpeg and turn on music downloading. On Linux (not FlatHub) you must to have install FFmpeg yourself.

FAQ.question: How to add song to playlist?
Can you upload source code?
FAQ.answer: Source code will be upload if I tired of developing. In the meantime, I have the right not to do it.

FAQ.question: Very low FPS
FAQ.answer: This problem occurs on monitors with G-Sync support. Disable hardware acceleration in the settings and restart the app.

FAQ.question: Stucks on the logo. Can't load!
FAQ.answer: This happens if the signal does not reach VK. In this case, check which country you live in, and make sure that you have a VPN enabled in the system (that is, not an extension in the browser). Next, if you do not have VK blocked in your country, make sure that you have the original Windows installed, and not the Windows build, where everything unnecessary is supposedly disabled.

FAQ.question: Does not run on my Linux distribution
FAQ.answer: Before the release, the application is tested on Fedora and Ubuntu, and if the application runs stably on these systems, then look for a problem in your system - the low-level problems of each OS are not supported.

FAQ.question: Can't download music on Linux / freezes on processing
FAQ.answer: App has no grant permissions on writing to file in folder that you specified.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Meridius is an absolutely free program for listening to music on the VK social network. Meridius offers a wide range of functionality, similar to the functionality of the social network itself. No dirty tricks - the program is absolutely free and without ads or any commercial purpose! The program was made by a music lover like you.

TIPS: Tip: Right-click on the playlist in the drop-down menu for quick playback
Tip: Right-click on "Music" or on your avatar to quickly play your music
Tip: Before asking for a feature from a developer, be ready to cooperate and help
Tip: Join our VK Group and Discord Server to keep up to date with news about player development and updates
Tip: Before asking a question, read the FAQ
Tip: Changing volume by mouse wheel with Shift key doubles volume changing step
Tip: Perhaps your issue has already been resolved. Update the application in a timely manner. Older versions are not supported
You can support the development of the project. The link is in the help window
NO_LISTENING_FRIENDS: None of your friends are listening to music right now
